description:
This is a test STAC catalog created for planetary surface datasets produced and/or provided by the Institut
d'Astrophysique Spatiale (IAS). It currently holds one Mars catalog, containing collections currently provided
through [PSUP](http://psup.ias.u-psud.fr/sitools/client-user/index.html?project=PLISonMars) (Planetary SUrface Portal).

![Mars](https://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/7/7a/Mars_%28white_background%29.jpg/120px-Mars_%28white_background%29.jpg)

links.title: IAS Planetary Surface Data STAC Catalog

title: IAS Planetary Surface Data STAC Catalog
